hall.name: Conference Hall
hall.description: Our spacious conference hall is perfect for hosting large events, conferences, and meetings. With a capacity of 40 people, it's ideal for corporate events, product launches, and networking sessions.

events.name: Events Space
events.description: Located in the heart of Almaty, our event space is perfect for hosting events, parties, and gatherings. With a capacity of 30 people, it's ideal for birthday parties, anniversaries, and corporate events.

meetings.name: Meetings Room
meetings.description: Our modern meeting room is perfect for hosting small to medium-sized meetings and events. With a capacity of 20 people, it's ideal for team meetings, brainstorming sessions, and client presentations.

coworking.name: Coworking Space
coworking.description: Our cozy coworking space is perfect for freelancers, entrepreneurs, and small teams. With a capacity of 15 people, it's ideal for collaborative work, networking, and innovation.

private.name: Private Office
private.description: Our private office is perfect for small teams and entrepreneurs who need a quiet and productive workspace. With a capacity of 10 people, it's ideal for focused work, meetings, and client consultations.

shared.name: Shared Office
shared.description: Our shared office space is perfect for teams and entrepreneurs who need a collaborative and dynamic workspace. With a capacity of 20 people, it's ideal for team meetings, brainstorming sessions, and client presentations.

room.name: Training Room
room.description: Our training room is perfect for hosting workshops, seminars, and training sessions. With a capacity of 25 people, it's ideal for corporate training, team building, and professional development.

classroom.name: Classroom for Rent
classroom.description: Our classroom is perfect for hosting lectures, workshops, and training sessions. With a capacity of 30 people, it's ideal for educational institutions, corporate training, and professional development.

seminar.name: Seminar Room
seminar.description: Our seminar room is perfect for hosting conferences, workshops, and training sessions. With a capacity of 40 people, it's ideal for corporate events, product launches, and networking sessions.
